settings.title: About Vanpowers
settings.body:
Our parent company entered the eBike industry in 2015 and has grown rapidly since then. Currently, we hold 45% of the sales among the Top 10 eBike brands on Amazon. Our team has grown to over 200 members, with staff based in North America, Europe, and Asia.

Our R&D team covers various fields, including industrial design, structural engineering, motor batteries, intelligent software, and hardware applications. We have our own laboratory equipped for comprehensive eBike testing, including drop tests, durability tests, and waterproof tests. Every model undergoes thorough testing and validation during the development phase to ensure reliability and safety.
